name: Gamma Ray Meltdown
description:
GMTK 2020 Submission

"The year is 2109. The Earth's core has cooled down and solidified. This has destroyed our magnetosphere. With solar activity OUT OF CONTROL and no shield to defend us, we must rely on one man... GAMMA MAN! Blasted by radiation as a baby for funsies.  Only he can survive outside on the radiation soaked surface.  Armed only with his trusty fire extinguisher, he battles the sun. Can he save us? He must! He is our only hope... "

We love you Gamma Man. You are our hero!"
